# preferredResolution

**Instance Property**

Your preferred external display resolution.

## Declaration

```swift
var preferredResolution: CMVideoDimensions { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureExternalDisplayConfiguration/preferredResolution] to set your desired resolution of the external display. When left at the default value of { 0, 0 },  the native resolution of the external display is used.

## Modifying the configuration

- **bypassColorSpaceConversion**: A property indicating whether the color space of the configurator’s preview layer should be preserved on the output display by avoiding color space conversions.
- **shouldMatchFrameRate**: A property indicating whether the frame rate of the external display should be configured to match the camera’s frame rate.
